full_summary:
# Esplanade Laurier Facade Repairs Tender Announcement
### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the L'Esplanade Laurier Façade Repairs project, located at 300 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, ON K1A 1J2.

### Tender Information
- **Reference Number:** WS4442569459-Doc4442696083
- **Publication Date:** February 13, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date:** March 14, 2024 at 14:00 EST
- **Amendment Date:** March 13, 2024
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** No later than July 22, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** July 22, 2024

### Project Description
This project involves the repair of the façade at the L'Esplanade Laurier building. Bidders must provide supporting documentation and submit their bids by the closing date and time. Late bids will not be considered.

### Mandatory Security Requirement
At the time of bid submission, bidders must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS). Failure to comply with this requirement will render the bid non-compliant.

### Procurement Method
This procurement is open to all qualified bidders. The selection criteria are based on the lowest price.

### Contact Information
For any questions or inquiries regarding this tender, please contact Gillian Fenwick, Contracting Authority, via the Event Messages within SAP Ariba.

### Notice URL
Access the tender notice at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18784122.

### Important Reminders
- All bid submissions shall be received by March 14, 2024 at 14:00 EST.
- Enquiries regarding this project should be directed to the contracting authority through the Event Messages within SAP Ariba within 5 business days prior to the date set for solicitation closing.
- Compliance with security requirements is mandatory.
